patthana8.59:1.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.59:2.1_0: Nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.59:3.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca nanadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.59:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
